reviews.title: Breeze is just beautiful
reviews.review_text: Breeze is the only shade of this line I have tried so far, but it's so nice that I've ordered two more in the same formulation. I can't get over how gorgeous the color is, and though I thought it would be far too warm for me, I'm so glad I gave it a try. The formula feels light and moisturizing, not heavy and waxy at all, but there is good color payoff. That lightness of feeling comes at the cost of having to apply a little more frequently, but that's no big deal because it only goes where you put it so this isn't a messy, slippery, bleeding-outside-the-lines stick that requires a mirror and complicated reapplication of liner and the whole nine. Breeze resembles a $20 Origins shade I used to love, and the just-right level of sheen and feeling of moisture mean I don't have to apply a gloss topcoat. It's just plain pretty. Can't believe this kind of classy shade is such a bargain buy. It's a perfect purse lippie that will go with almost everything.

I'm a senior lady in my late 60's and need a more moisturizing lipstick, more along the lines of a lip gloss with less color saturation. Otherwise, it's a nice product.

reviews.review_text: Love the color of this "Wet and Wild" Lipstick! Just started wearing it, great look!!

Though I was quite impressed by the pigmentation of Wet N Wild's lipsticks, I did feel they were a bit strange tasting. Though they did feel quite nice while on my lips, but they did fade a bit on their own, and tend end up almost done after a meal. But then again, it's almost impossible to find a silk finish lip product immune to transferring, so I'll let that one slide. Overall, as a backup, I think this lipstick is okay, but as an everyday lipstick you'd reach for, I don't know.. The quality for the price was impressive, like I said, but not too great. But again, as a backup used occasionally, it's not too bad. [product:wet-n-wild-silk-finish-lipstick]

This surprisingly inexpensive lipstick left me to be quite skeptical at first. However, like always I had good faith the Wet N Wild would pull through. The name does not lie, this lipstick does apply and feel just like silk. I found it to be very hydrating and I did not see the product bleed like most drugstore lipsticks do. That being said, I wasn't impressed with the coverage. I found the pigment to be quite rich, which I loved. Yet, after a few applications the color did fade and it faded fast over time. I found that one or two applications did the job just right. I would use this product again, but for more of a natural barely-there look.

reviews.title: Love the color
reviews.review_text: I've been using for years and I love how moist it is.

reviews.title: Great Value
reviews.review_text: Wet & Wild provides an excellent lipstick and makeup. Other companies charge exorbitant prices to cover advertising and fancy packaging. I prefer to support Wet & Wild that offer real value for customer dollars.

reviews.title: Rich color, texture and great price!
reviews.review_text: Been using Wet N' Wild lipsticks long time for a generous size lipstick in tube, finished product is glossy and beautiful color, healthy ingredients. I can have more colors enjoy for price, quality and size of lipstick than any other brand on the market today.

It is a good product very very affordable if on a budget. Ive used these lipstick before. What I kind of like about the lipstick is that its sheer although I would want it to be less sheer. I love the consistency of the lipstick its very creamy and has a good smell. I would buy it again.

The wet and. Wild silk finish lipstick is honestly not that expensive, the only problem for me was that it Didn't stay on as long as I would have liked it to. I wouldn't recommend this product for people that want a lipsticks that will stay on for a pretty long time

The formula in this lipstick isn't as good as others I've tried at the same price point. Comparisons usually aren't fair because all products are different and could be used for different things but I don't know what you would use this for unless you were going for a patchy mess.

This is a pretty nice lipstick in a really pretty color. It's a grey-brown shade that has a good bit of shine. It feels great on the lips too. Overall, the staying power is about average for a bullet lipstick, but it wears down evenly and doesn't get crusty or dry so it can be easily reapplied.

Wet N Wild is known for its affordability and this stick is no exception. The product applies nicely, unfortunately the color isn't overly vibrant and fades easily. If I needed a specific color to complete a look and was short on time and on a budget I may consider purchasing again.

This product has a lot of room for improvement . It didnt meet my expectations sadly . I have used this a few times to try to get myself used to it see if id like it but it didnt work , i do not like this product . It is not long lasting and its very smudgy . The look of the product on my lips wasnt pleasing . Would not recommend . [product:wet-n-wild-silk-finish-lipstick]

I love the color of this lipstick I love how easy it applies how pigmented it is. I love the twist tube and the clear lid so I can see the color. I like that it has a little glow to it but I wish it had a little more. I hate that it comes off on my coffee cup but it is very affordable and I like that it don't make my lips sticky it actually moistorizes them. I will purchase again because I love this color and for the price which is very affordable it is amazing it is amazing.

A nice classic lipstick. They come in a wide range of colors. They glide on and wear comfortably. I don't find myself reaching for this product, and I think it's because it's not long wearing, and I wear my make up for a lot of hours in a day. I would buy more of these if I saw a color that caught my eye.

Love the lipstick. Very creamy but not thick on lips, nicely velvet look. The cap cracked for no reason, then it does not stay on. This is the second WnW cap malfunction. The packaging is not impressive so not good as a gift. But nice to treat myself when I can not splurge. Lol

This color (fuschia with blue pearls) is one of the prettiest colors I've ever seen! The color deserved a full five stars plus some! The staying power is horrible! It's not worth stocking up on these as your go-to lipsticks! It is very inexpensive & pretty, so it's nice to have one of these to keep in your purse for backup!

This is definitely an 80's or 90's type color. I think my nana wore this while I was growing up. It's a pretty pink, but definitely frosty! I would compare it to the metallic colors of lipstick we have now. I would not repurchase this item. I would definitely use it for a Halloween costume.

Beautiful, vibrant color. It doesn't last long though, and comes off easily. I like to pair it with a exfoliated lip, and eos as a gentle eye catching tint. The peach sunset color is one of my favorites. Also the wine color. Summer/Spring & Fall/Winter.

I love this red I mix it with a little of my concealer to make this adorable pinky red shade I love the shine and glitter in it I bought this back in November for a holiday part and I love the cute simple packaging although the cap breaks very easily

These are amazing for the price! They glide on nicely and feel great on, and though they don't last forever, it is not a problem to touch up throughout the day, especially with the price! The colors are all beautiful and super pigmented also. Highly recommend!!

For the price and its product this is really the best value.I love wet n wild! This Silk Finish has so many shades to enjoy from day wear to night out, Nouveau Pink makes me shine through the crowd, very beautiful young soft on my lips and last. Love it!

This product applies very smoothly, which is a pro. However, the only downside I had with this product is it is not very long wearing. It comes off very easily such as by eating or kissing. If you know you will not really be doing any activities that requires the use of your lips or mouth, this product is for you!

It feels pretty nice and smooth in the lips is a really good lipstick and is pretty affordable for the price is great I recommend this and is really good if you are starting to do your makeup and your are looking for the colors that look good on you this is a great lipstick to do that because is pretty affordable

reviews.title: I'm not personally a
reviews.review_text: I'm not personally a fan of wet and wild lipstick and it literally only has to do with the fact that all the colors are too subtle or not subtle enough for my super pale skin tone. Otherwise this lipstick is silky smooth for a bit. About after an hour though the smoothness does start to deplete.

Good , will stay on for a few hour before I apply more. I like the color ,shine and how it feels the on my lips its not too greasy, it's a very inexpensive product the only problem I have with it is the lid breaks pretty easily it needs to be a little bit more sturdy.

I love these lipsticks they are super rich in color and pigamention you get rich color pay off on the lips they are super comfortable to wear on the lips they have amazing lasting power as well I can eat or drink and it stays on the lips I even got my best friend hooked great quality lipstick at a affordable price.

I love this! The Cashmere is going to be my new fall/early winter color - good color, easy to apply and doesn't 'bleed' at the edges of my lips, just a bit of frost, and a beautiful warm autumn-y color. It's soft and smooth on my lips, and lasts well, I would definitely buy this again, and try other colors from the same line! As an update, I have now tried some new shades, and am very happy with those as well! The new shades were Cherry Frost, Dark Pink Frost, Will You Be With Me (pictured), along with Hot Red (not pictured, similar to Cherry Frost but no frost).

Wet n wild was my first true red lipstick. It was amazingly priced and didn't have a cheap smell to it either. I've used wet and wild for years and never have any complaints about the product, although the packaging leaves more to be desired. But you get what you pay for

A great affordable, drugstore lipstick. The formula was smooth and creamy, and didn't pull on my lips during application. It lasted about as long as any lipstick tends to in my opinion. Definitely shows signs of wear throughout the day from eating and drinking. I would repurchase this lipstick again in the future.

reviews.title: Tried & True Favorite!
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing this product for years, specifically in the shades Sunset Peach and Breeze. I have been through packaging changes with this lipstick, used it as a cream blush, had times where it has melted completely in the TX summer heat and I still always go back to it! I am 28 and still love the super affordable lipsticks I first tried from the drugstore many years ago! Please keep making them!

This product is nice for the price but i would definitely choose a higher branded lipstick over this. This lipstick is kind of sheer when applying. Also this lipstick is not long lasting .But still nice pigment and nice if you are looking for a cheaper lipstick.

For being so ultra-cheap, this deserves its five stars. You can't beat the price or the colours! It feels lovely on the lips. Wet 'n' Wild Silk Finish lipstick is wonderful to experiment with or to take a chance with, since it's so cheap. It also has one of my absolute favourite lipstick colours of all time.

I absolutely love this lipstick! It is so creamy and velvety! The cost is so reasonable! It allows you to purchase every shade without breaking the bank! It will last you all day, but you do have to reapply after eating or drinking. I would definitely buy this again and highly recommend it!

For very inexpensive drugstore lipstick this one does very well. I bought this in an orange shade for summer and it looks great. Very vibrant but not flamboyant. It glides on smoothly and is great for everyday wear. It doesn't last all day but it gets the job done.

This is a pretty good product. It is pretty cheap so you get what you pay for. It lasts a decent amount of time for me and it does keep my lips soft. This is a good lipstick if you're in a rush and need something cheap. It doesn't feel cheap on your lips but it does fade fairly quick so you should keep it on you to reapply. I would recommend this and i would buy it again.

This lipstick is decent. It is definitely good for it's price but then again, you get what you pay for! It is good enough for a few hours and they have some really cute colors. I just wouldn't wear it to somewhere I have to stay long hours for. Overall, it's okay.

Good product for the price. Lipstick glides on smoothly and gives your lips some shine with color. The only downside is that it will not last long and you will have to reapply it often. But it's a really cheap price,so it's a good way to try out new lip colors.

I rate Wet N Wild lipstick a 4/5 stars because, the packaging was nice and didn't break. For a cheaper lipstick it did meet my expectations. I was a first time user for this and I did like it, although it could've had more pigment. I would recommend and I would buy again.

reviews.title: For being so cheap,
reviews.review_text: For being so cheap, I was surprised how good this was! The formula is moisturizing, and very pigmented color. I have had this for many years now, and still works well. I would recommend if you want an affordable lipstick, or especially if you want a bright color that you're not sure if it'll work out.

Very pretty color. Love the formula it glides onto the lips. Very very good price for the product you are getting. Packing is very simple and to the point. Lots of great colors to choose from. Wish it stayed on a little longer though and it gets all over everything! Would recommend to someone who does not mind reapplying lipstick or someone who was looking for cheap but good make up.

I had such high hopes for this lipstick! Firstly, though it's advertised as ‚ÄúDark Wine‚Äù, this swatched as more of a bright red. It also came off way too easily after applying it. Wet and Wild is always pretty hit or miss for me. And this was unfortunately a miss

love the colors and feel of this product. it really is very silky smooth and moisturizing which i love. i've used this product for quite some time and will continue to just throw it in my bag for touch ups. however this product does need a lot of reapplying if you want it to stay.

This is okay for it's price. It's not gonna be super duper nice because it's cheap. It doesn't smell bad. It has chalky feel that makes it kind of uncomfortable. It is kind of drying as well so I always put on my carmex before I apply this. It's okay for the price.

This is my go to ‚Äúgoing out‚Äù pink. These lipsticks do not leave my lips dry which is a big plus for me. The color last on your lips for a whole without having to retouch. They are super affordable so you can stock up on as many as you'd like at a time.

It's okay for a very inexpensive lipstick. We used this product for lip color on several tween aged children during a play production put on by the local schools. It stayed on for the duration of the performance and was available in a variety of colors.

This is a good lipstick if you're a fan of drugstore brands. It applies smoothly and it doesn't streak. It has a very nice formula. It's perfect if you want a soft touch of color that doesn't dry down like matte lipsticks do. The only bad thing, which happens with most lipsticks, is it does smear.

I have this lipstick in the color secret muse # 560B guys this is my go to fav drug store lipstick by a very well known very inexpensive brand this is a smooth lipstick goes on easy and last the color dose fade if wearing it heavy. I use this as a stain for a more natural look but this color is the best because you can put more on for a deeper color Ôøº

I really liked this color. It matched well with my skin tone. However, I would not purchase it again if I could because it made my lips dry over time. I usually like most wet and wild products, which is why I purchased it. However, I was not as happy with the product.

I can't begin to say how many lipsticks just haven't done the job for me. I don't mind at all that the Silk Finish lipsticks have to be reapplied after an hour or so, because the price is fabulous and the color choices are well worth the purchase. They really feel very silky! However, the loose cap slips off easily so take heed. But if your on a budget. It's a great product for the price.

That price tho! Super affordable, WAY better than any 20 to 40 lipstick and the color is so beautiful. My old manager introduced me to this lipstick and I have stuck with it ever since. It will wear off but it won't dry up your lips. Totally recommend stop spending your money on high cost lipsticks.

I used to love this lippie I'm not sure if the last one I got was a messed up batch or they changed the formula but I wasn't a huge fan! The price is great ofcourse the packaging standard and the formula before went on nicely but this time it was all patchy! I will be buying it again to see if it was just the one I bought or all are different! I have recommended the products and my next purchase will tell if I'm going to again!

I really like this lipstick. The color is dark and vampy which is exactly what i wanted from this black orchid color. It goes on very smooth and stays on as best as lipstick does. I want to note that i am not the greatest with actual lipsticks, i tend to overfill or smear them during application and then get mad. But, from the few times i have used this product i did like the color and the way it feels on my lips. I don't want to fault the product for my inability to apply correctly. If your looking for a lipstick that feels great on your lips and has great color, this for sure will be a lipstick for you!

I know that wet and wild is your basic drugstore brand cosmetic. But let's face it, it's been around forever add it gets the job done. You can't beat a buck for a tube of lipstick. I would definitely buy again especially if I'm in a bind on a night out.

I have used Wet N Wild's lipsticks since I was younger. It is definitely one of the more affordable brands for lipstick. It looks amazing but it does get on things like glasses if you're drinking out of one, possibly kissing your animal aswell. But it looks really good and it doesn't stain, it's easy to clean off.

I absolutely LOVE this lipstick. It comes in a huge variety of colors, it is very cheap, and goes on very well. It doesn't leave your lips feeling dry or sticky. I also love how long it stays. The only downside is it works as a lip stain as well. I personally liked that, but maybe not everyone will. Worth it though!

For a drugstore, inexpensive lipstick, these are everything! They are high pigmented and so comfortable to wear. They don't dry down matte, which I don't mind but I know some people do. Unfortunately they aren't kiss or food proof, but honestly for the price I don't mind that at all. And even though they aren't kiss proof, they don't smudge all over your face like some other lipsticks do! If you're wanting to experiment with lipsticks /color but don't want to spend a bunch of money, definitely look at these!

Depending on what lipstick you get, it's great, the only one I have a complaint about is the dark wine color, because it gets all over your face and is hard to take off because it just keeps smearing, but besides those it's pretty nice for what you pay for and lasts pretty well for something that isn't supposed to be all day wear

Ok. So for the money and the sheer volume of colors they Have, you can not beat this lipstick. I have at least 20. Of the darker pinks especially the pigment is great. I like to match my blush with lipstick and with these that's totally possible. Cheap does not always mean garbage.

I like this lipstick! I always find it at such a great price. The variety of colors are very pleasing. It does dry my lips out a little but the price is well worth putting a coat of shea butter under lipstick. If they found a way to moisturize just a little more I would be in love!

These lipsticks are very creamy and smooth I really recommend this besides it being super affordable they have a variety of colors and they're great for the fall especially the dark ones. VERY recommended product. Perfect for something simple to even a dramatic look.

Absolutely amazing product it goes on smoothly and color lasts quite awhile leaving lips moisturized instead of the usual dry lipstick and it also has a very good she'll to it instead of the oily plastic smell most lipsticks and lipglosses have overall great product.

These lipsticks are okay. They don't last very long and are sort of streaky but the price can't be beat so i have a large collection of these because of the pretty colors. They look good on pictures or for editorial purposes but if you're using it for daily use then don't chose these and spend a little more to get a better lipstick.

I have never gotten more compliments on ANY lipstick than I do when I wear this one. I was nervous to wear it at first because it's very pink, but everyone said it looked really good! It also feels really good on my lips. I will continue to purchase this lipstick and others of the wet n wild brand.

I gave it a 5 because what more do you expect for the price. I get good color pay off, may have to swipe a few more times but I usually top with a gloss so this lipstick is just fine for me. I have been using Wet n Wild for years and it is always my go to to grab a lipstick in a color that I may not wear all of the time.

Colors are not long lasting and don't come off as pigmented as they look. I tried two different colors to see how I liked them, it's easy to apply of course but the colors just don't last as long as I would like and the colors are not heavily pigmented. I won't be purchasing anymore lipsticks from wet n wild.

Wet N Wild still has lipstick and nail polish priced like it was 30 years ago and I so love them for that. I use this all the time and buy the lighter colors to help enhance lip lips. So yourself a favor and go buy one in every color so you can experiment with different looks and tones before you decide to purchase a higher priced lip color. Wet n Wilds the best! ** I'm wearing color: A Short Affair 501C

The Wet n Wild Silk Finish Hot Red lipstick is one of my favorite of the less expensive go to red lipsticks out there. The application is quick and easy and a good coverage for a less expensive brand. Of this product I am a repeat user. I would recommend this red lipstick to any one of my friends who are on a budget and looking for a good classic red lip.

I didn't like this color or the texture look more like a sheer tint was very disappointed I love wet and wilds high lighters but lipsticks can use some help wouldn't recommend this to any one unless buying it for a child, and they use it as play make up because the pay off is so bad

Wet N wild is way underrated. I love their products, especially their lipsticks. They're so creamy and silky when you put them on. The only downfall to these are, they don't last very long. But it's still worth the money, especially if you don't mind taking a few seconds to reapply after a few hours.

This lipstick would not be one of my go to lipsticks. The color is vibrant but it isn't very bold. It's hard to get a nice full coverage and it can stain the skin around your lips red very quickly. Despite this the formula is very smooth and comfortable to wear.

This lipstick has a very nice color and it is pretty pigmented. For my first time using it, i would say I'm decently suprised. For me, after it was on the lips it seemed a little too liquidy for a lipstick. I would buy it again because of the price being low.

This is a super pretty red color! It has a metallic red tint to it too. I actually received this as part of a gift from a friend and I liked it a lot. The lipstick inside the packaging seems a little flimsy, but it's easy to get over. I definitely recommend buying this to add to your collection!

I love this product! It was very good for its price. The plastic material of the lipstick cap broke, but what can you expect. The color was pigmented and lasted a while. The only minus was that the lipstick smudged on your lips after the first hour. For the price, I recommend :)!

reviews.title: Almost perfect, goes bad quickly
reviews.review_text: I love these lipsticks. I have apparently severely sensitive lips because most lip products of any sort burn my lips, even those made for sensitive lips, or made without anything you'd think would irritate your lips. Not even the reds in this whole collection cause me any irritation or even dryness! The color payoff is phenomenal, they glide ride on, go on generally even, and and feel quite medium In thickness. I ALWAYS like my lips (the outer part of them)and blot with paper towel, that's how I get them to stay for HOURS or until I eat something. This also dramatically reduces transfer. These are all my favorite lipsticks; however, I do find they change color and get waxy-smelling within less than a month, sometimes less than 2 weeks, regardless of storing method and use (I've tried various ways). They also have too little variety. I wish there were at least more purple tones or a black or blue one.

My favorite lipsticks are wet n wild. They last until you wash it off. Rich colors, great variety at a reasonable price. Available at every drugstore. Can't beat it for the price. I buy several & keep one at home & one in my purse, one in my attach√© bag.

The price for these are unbeatable! The have a large variety of colours. They smell a little artificial and the packaging is cheep but that probably has to do with the price point. However some shades are just as good as expensive alternatives. I would purchase more for sure. There is no harm and trying these because of the price.

I absolutely love the formula of wet n wild lipsticks. They are really long lasting and work super good. They feel really nice on your lips and I own many of wet n wild lipsticks because they are a really affordable price for good quality makeup. I would definitely recommend to others.

It's definitely a silk formula. They could work on the formula by having more coverage with one swipe instead of having to go back and forth with it. But, for a cheap lipstick. I really wouldn't expect the best. I was nervous about buying this, just because some times cheap lipsticks are cheap for a reason. But, I was pleasantly surprised with this outcome!

Lo que m√°s puedo recalcar de este lipstick es su precio son s√∫per econ√≥micos y sus colores preciosos pero su duraci√≥n no es de las mejores necesitas retocar muy seguido, pero es una buena opci√≥n para el diario porque no maltrata tus labios y el precio es buen√≠simo.

To be honest I have been in love with brown colors lately for the past few months. Brown clothing, brown lipstick even nail polish and I cam came across this just randomly shopping one day and it looks better on I will say. I love the finish and again wet n wild is for everyone. I legit paid 1 dollar for this at a drug store in the next town over about an month ago and I've been hooked. No lip liner add no nothing just the lipstick and it's to die for

The color does not look at all like it does in the tube! I know it was only a dollar but I'm still pretty disappointed in the results. Also probably one of the worst lipstick formulas I've tried and the finish is in the awkward space between matte and glossy

I love this lipstick!! First of all it's the perfect dark shade of wine. Very complimentary. It also is rich and moisturizing without feeling goopy. It is pigmented and lasts a pretty long time for a moisturizing lipstick. Longer if you prep and prime before. It is definitely in the rotation. Also, I had to give this 5 stars. I have lipsticks that are 7 time as expensive as this one that I don't like nearly this much. Bonus: it is only a couple dollars!!

I'm not too fond of wet and wild products. I prefer revlon when it comes to lips. They do have a nice variety of colors and if you're not wanting to break the bank for lip stuff then maybe you should try here. Sometimes you get what you pay for! I'm not saying it's a bad product but I prefer others

The texture, application and feel of this variety is much better than the matte lipstick they sell. It goes on smoothly and has good feel and about average length of wear. What I really don't like, is that too many of the shimmer shades are really frosted rather than shimmer. Not a good look for anyone, very similar to the 70s or 80s white and heavily frosted shades. They need to dial up shimmer and dial down the heavy frosted look and it would be a much better product.

This brand is so amazing! I really really recommend it. It is very effective and it met my expectations 100%. I was very happy with the product and the packaging was nice. Honestly I can't say it needs much improvement because it was already a great product!

Love the finish of this lipstick. Great price. Goes on smoothly and is not sticky or drying. It wears about as long as most lipsticks. My only complaint is the funky lid. You have to line it up just right on the tube. This is annoying. Nothing fancy here just an affordable serviceable lipstick.

This lipstick is very creamy. It goes on smoothly and the pigments are amazing! One swipe and BAM it's there! There are many, many colors to choose from, I personally love the darker shades in this line. They are very affordable yet, great quality products! The only complaint I have for them is the shape of the tip, it's more rounded then pointed so it makes it a little more difficult to get a perfectly sculpted look quickly.

These lipsticks are pretty much the definition of you get what you paid for. I have only bought a black color from the brand, as it was the only company i found had that shade readily available. It did the job but i had to reapply like every 20 minutes. It was very smudgey.

I really like this lipstick as it is really nice and creamy it did exceed my expectations as well. I didnt think it would be so good as it was so inexpensive as well. But when I used it I was quite surprised. The only thing I dont like is how it smells.

I've used the Wet n Wild brand for years and this is one of the few products I've bought for aaages. My ONLY complaint about it is that it doesnt have the greatest staying power but powering over the top helps it last a little longer. The price is great, especially for that quick dash into a store while you're out and about for those spur of the moment outings.

I like this lipstick. Budget friendly and I can find it pretty much anywhere. The product isn't long lasting in my opinion. Comes in a variety of colours. The packaging is awful though. Could be better. I carry my lipstick that I put on in my purse or pocket and it never fails, I end up losing the top. It won't stay on.

Great lipstick for the price. It is very pigmented and has a great color range. My main issue is the lipstick does transfer but much less than most lipsticks in its price point. I would recommend, especially to try out color ranges without too much of an investment

This only gets two stars for nostalgia factor. It's not good product. It goes on like sandpaper and has coverage like glass. It's cheap as hell and is everyone's first foray into makeup. I'd recommend this as much as I recommend Mike's Hard Lemonade...it's the first thing we all got drunk on and holds some good, if vague memories, but I wouldn't be caught dead buying it today.

These are such great, affordable lipsticks! You can't expect the packaging quality of something you would get at Sephora... wet n wild's packaging is simple plastic. But the actual lipstick glides on smoothly, has great pigmentation, and feel very creamy. Definitely a great bang for your buck.

Hi, I just wanna say I really enjoyed using this product it definitely met all of my expectations. It was long lasting. This was my first time using this product and i was extremely happy how amazing it was. I will be buying it again whenever I run out!!!!

It's a good and cheap product worth the price f you are looking for something light. It is super smooth to apply but transfers really fast. The color only lasts for a couple hours. It's really nice if you want to get something for low price that's not too over the top.

These lipsticks are okay, a little hard to apply and the pigment isn't super amazing but the lipsticks still does its job for the amazing price. Colours are a beautiful shade range and the names are just awesome!! I would recommend only to people who don't want a super bold long lasting lip colour. ‚ù§Ô∏è

This is my all time favorite lipstick! I have gotten so many compliments on this lipstick, mainly the shade Java. I love how well it applies and the pigment is great. It has nice packaging and I love how cheap this is and yet how great of quality it is. It beats out some of the high end brands in my opinion.

reviews.title: These are very cheap
reviews.review_text: These are very cheap lipsticks. They are very sheer and do not last long whatsoever. They are very affordable, but because of how cheap they are they do not work very well. I recommended to splurge a little more to find a product that actually works.

This color is so pretty and looks absolutely gorgeous on everyone! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a cheap but colorful and long lasting lipstick! My only problem with it is that it doesn't smell as nice as others but it works amazing still!

Reasonable for a drugstore brand. The price is climbing a bit but not too far out of the category range as yet. Smooth and easy to apply, the longevity could be better, starts to fade at about 2 hours. A good 'in a pinch' daily as long as the reapply doesn't bug you. [product:wet-n-wild-silk-finish-lipstick-521a-fushia-with-blue-pearl]

This product is okay for the most part. it is streaky and not long lasting at all. if youre going out and you have this product do not wear it out it will most likely disappear half way through the night. i would improve by making it not streaky and more of a matte lipstick and longer lasting i would not recommend this product to others. it is great for just taking selfies though!

I'm okay with this product its just it doesn't stay for more than 20 minutes. The application process is super smooth and glides onto the lips! which i love! this was actually my very first time using this. i would recommend this to others if they had enough time to re-apply

This product goes on smooth and easy. I bought it because I wanted a quick bold red that looked good when I didn't have anything underneath it. The only thing is like all lipsticks be careful with how much put on I found when I put on a little to much it looked kinda sloppy and got clumpy in the creases of the corner on my lips. [product:wet-n-wild-silk-finish-lipstick]

This is a very affordable brand and this lipstick is great for people who are interested in makeup but are on a budget! The packaging isn't ideal because it's mainly plastic but for the price it works fine. The color was nice but it didn't last all day without reapplication but it still looks nice

If you're looking for a simple and sheer lipstick, this is for you. However, if you're looking for a lip color that is opaque in one coat, this is not. It is buildable but will leave you feeling like you cannot open or close your mouth due to the amount of product it takes to build the color to an opaque color.

Wet and wild is my favorite brand it's cheap affordable beautiful look great products great colors smells wonderful looks good with any skin tone there's different colors to pick from and to choose from it's amazing recommend anyone buying it but would like to try it more products.

Wet n wild are a very affordable brand and I love it because everything they sell is such good quality and it never lets me down especially their lip products! I really recommend that you go out and try them and if you prefer matte, creamy, moisturizing or glossy they have it !

Hard to apply pigmented but creamy and does not dry down matte I don't know if there are other finishes but all mine have been very glossy and I do not like that. My biggest complaint is they need a more colorful and more laid-back colors and they don't have a wide shade range.

Honestly one of my favorite lipsticks out of the many I have and give me a really pretty red lip its really smooth to put on. It gives a really pretty finish when youre done and stays on doesnt really come off of drinking something until you wipe it off

The product is really nice and easy to apply and clean up its really smooth and silky It has a pretty glossy finish. I was surprised cause I thought drug store make up would be kinda useless but It was amazing, the price for it was fabulous! It's not to pricey. And I hope others try this out cause it's a really nice product!

My favorite shade since who remembers when. Nice feel/texture, applies smoothly and lasts for a few hours. It's inexpensive and I often pick up other colors to experiment with. Even though it doesn't cost a lot, it looks like a higher priced product when I'm wearing it. The only drawback (but I still love this stuff) is that all of the silky lipsticks have a strong 'lipstick taste'.

For a fraction of the cost of other drug store brands, this is a really great quality lip product. It's standard bullet Shape is great for storage. It's got a beautiful, creamy finish that doesn't smudge, and is a great dupe for high end brands. My only complaint is that the lid tends to come off easily in a makeup bag.

This stuff is great! I'm normally not a lipstick wearer, since I just like to play around but I love it. It really surpassed my expectations. I don't know how long lasting it really was since I was just playing around and took it off after but I'll make sure to try again!

The six pack wet and wild new silk finish lipstick and dark pink Frost was a very nice lipstick to use it stayed on throughout the day and did not require me to reapply the color was very nice and I got many compliments I would definitely buy this lipstick again in the future

I love this lipstick. I usually stick to glosses and sheer colors, but this one was PERFECT. I love anything maroon, and it matched perfectly with the outfit I bought to wear with it! I always get a lot of compliments when I wear this lipstick too. I will continue to buy it.

These lipsticks are okay but the packaging was a bit problematic for me, as the plastic lid did break and now it likes to slide around within my makeup collection... But I like the color and how it's shiny but not tacky. I had a rather brown tone and it did like to come off easily, so if that matters to you, this isn't the one.

I love the way this lip color looks and feels on. I was looking for a everyday nude and I found it! Most days this is my go to lip. It's quick, easy, and looks great! I would recommend it for someone who doesn't want a matte lip but isn't a fan of gloss. It's the perfect in between!

This is actually the product I use now. It's my favorite because of the color. I use it more then any other lipstick I own. I recommend this to all females that like lipsticks. It doesn't last as long as a matte lipstick would but it lasts a decent amount of time before having to reapply

I am going to be doing new products but again this was one I had a while ago. I love Wet n Wild lipstick. Color stays, doesn't dry your lips out, but still use Chapstick underneath. Better with lipliner to outline your mouth is small.  Buy anywhere, worth the purchase.

Goes on nice, and has nice color. The downside is it doesn't stay on as long, but with the low price, it's still worth picking up because the color is definitely great and you can reapplying without worrying about spending an arm and a leg for another one.

I love how this product just glides on my lips, and how affordable it is! For the price, it is very long lasting and I wasn't disappointed with the product. I wanted a product that could deliver a lot for not a lot of money and my expectations were met! Totally in love!!!

I love the color but I did notice with this specific lipstick it dried my lips out. I want a lipstick that won't dry my lips out but will make them feel hydrated and healthy at the same time. I might've just had one bad experience with this product but I want to try some of the different products with Wet N Wild

This lipstick is good, but I've got to admit i am a bit disappointed at the texture. I have to apply it a lot to get the shade even. I have a light pink shade that i love but it is just too buttery. It's a good casual color and it doesn't last a long time so its good for something really casual like the black or something.

this lipstick is extremely mediocre. it is very affordable but for the price, the quality is expected. it works fine. does the job. i found myself reapplying this product about once every hour. i love wet n wild, but their lipsticks in general don't really astonish me.

It's a good lipstick for about a dollar. Has a slight simmer finish I normally prefer matte. Doesn't last thru eating or kissing. Unless you add a concealer under it. I am repeat buyer though because it's a good brand and o the product for cheap and lots of colors to choose from. Also its cruelty free which I find a huge plus

For the price I paid, this lipstick was generally good. However, the longwear of this lipstick is extremely short and after an hour or two, you will definitely need a reapplication. Though I will say the colour is bright and feels fairly comfortable on my lips. Overall a nice lipstick.

I usually don't like lipsticks with silk finish's but this ones color was so beautiful i just had to purchase it. It was very easy to apply and just slid on my lips. I used a toilet paper to mattify it a little because i usually don't enjoy the shine but this product still pulled through for me.

reviews.title: Black Orchid
reviews.review_text: Nor very silky, stays on well, but not creamy at all. Beautiful, deep color. Reminds me of Revlon Black Cherry or Raisin Rage, except for dollars less. I don't especially like the case, the top of the lipstick is hard not to ding, and I did that first day I had it.

This Wet N Wild Dark Wine lipstick has a beautiful medium reddish and pinkish color . It was easy to apply directly on the lips and it was soft . The packaging came in a cute little box . Dark Wine was a long lasting lipstick . I would totally recommend this to anyone that loves medium lip color ( not to light and not to dark ). Dark wine on your lips could be a everyday lipstick for anyone .

reviews.title: This lipstick just doesn't
reviews.review_text: This lipstick just doesn't work for me , leaves my lips feeling dry and it also wears off too fast . Not crazy about the formula . I am however a big fan of Wet n wild . Just not crazy for this formula of lipstick .Wet 'n' Wild Silk Finish Lip Stick Hot Red (3-pack)

reviews.title: Love it, but it needs more shade range
reviews.review_text: Bought this a few days ago in store and decided to look online for more colors/shades, disappointed to find that there were only pinks or dark reds available, even though the select screen shows them as purple. It also severely stained my lips when i used it. Loved it, but you really do get what you pay for.

This product and others along this line are horrible! I don't know if it was just me but the color of the lipstick is not how it'll show on your lips. The plastic always broke. And no I wouldn't recommend to others! Except a little girl who doesn't know much about makeup and wants some lol!

We used this as a lipstick for my daughter for her dance solo. The color was bright and stood out on stage. It didn't come off with sweating and was very easy to apply. It lasted through all her time at competition. We will definitely use this again for stage.

I love these lipsticks! I have nearly everyone of them. They are very smooth and creamy. They don't dry out your lips, even if you wear it for a while day. It is so easy to apply because it's so buttery and smooth. I have replaced any that I have finished. I would completely recommended these to anyone be it a beginner to advanced or even someone that just wears lipstick.

If you're looking for affordable lip products at a convenience store, you'll sure encounter this one. Recent years I realized Wet N Wild is not my favorite go to brands for lip products. Not moisturizing and doesn't last long. Need lots of application to show its color.

reviews.title: I didn't really like
reviews.review_text: I didn't really like the color of this lipstick with my skin tone although the texture was something. It was so smooth and gentle on my lips with so much pigment I just loved it. Even when you wipe it off it stains on it lips and I loved that about this product

Very good product very silky formula just like the name Silk finish very moisturizing i'm a first-time user for this particular lipstick but I love the brand were in while the packaging is very nice and I would definitely buy more of their products in the future

reviews.title: I love this shade!
reviews.review_text: I love this shade! It applies on very nice and it's easy to use. It doesn't wipe off really easy and it mixes well with lipgloss. I use this regularly for my cosplays and it really makes my lips pop with color. It's also pretty affordable. I would definitely recommend it!

I got this lipstick in a bright red for Christmas and I liked it but it wasn't a love the color was really bright but wore off super fast it didn't feel great on the lips for me and it was reasonably priced I may buy it again if I had a special occasion but I would never recommend it to anyone i had to reapply more then six times when I wore it out which usually I would only reapply like twice maybe three times I know that it is not a stain but still for a red it wore of very fast. This wasn't my favorite lip product and it didn't work for me but that doesn't mean it won't work for you

I really enjoy this lipstick, it gives your lips a nice healthy glow and pop of color. The price point for wet n wild is always great and I think it's a steal because there are high end lipsticks that perform the same and cost four times more. You will need to reapply but it's easy.

This is a really good option if you're testing out how a color would look on you or if you just need the lip color for a photoshoot or something where it doesn't need to last for a long time. It feels pretty comfortable and moisturizing on the lips, but the downside is it transfers like crazy. It's not long wearing at all, but for a buck I can't really complain that much.

I love a good bargain and this one is no different! I love the way it looks and feels. Love all the different colors. The only thing I hate is it diesnt last long. Lol i have yet to find the perfect one but imma keep trying! I really like wet n wild products though.

I like this lipstick especially because I can find it at the dollarstore, it is cheap and convenient. It's good for everyday use and when I go out to a especially occasion I'll wear something fancier. I have the Cherry Frost and the Will you be with me? (Matte).

The wet and wild silk finish lipstick is very nice it's not overpriced it's a good affordable lipstick in my personal opinion the packaging I think could be better but at the price point you really can't argue it because you're getting such an affordable lipstick you know to mean so other than the packaging I really enjoyed this and I think it's a nice lipstick overall the packaging is quite cheap though like the Broke on mine so just be careful not to drop it but other than the packaging ,it's nice

There isn't much to say about this lipstick. It's not the greatest but it isn't the worst either. If your in a pinch and need a lippies then it's okay. But I won't go out of my way to get the newest color. It's not my favorite formula and it smells like a crayon to me.

These lipsticks glide on easily however they do not last long, you will have to reapply multiple times! I didn't mind it this much as they are not lip stains nor do they advertise that for this lip product. I do recommend this to others if you're looking for an easy to use lipstick or if you're just looking for some quick temp colour.

The [product:wet-n-wild-silk-finish-lipstick] are pretty good and very affordable I do not like some of the color choices but that's all based on opinion I do however like that I can layer them on top of a lip liner and the colors would blend so beautifully.

This product was not one of my favorite lipsticks. I think its okay if you want to experiment with different colors of lipstick to see what looks good on you but it doesnt stay on for very long. You have to keep reapplying it. I would not recommend this product to friends.

This is a nice brown taupe kind of shade. I mean these are a dollar or two so you can't really go wrong with that price. They are not matte which it does advertise in the title but when they say silky they mean it. When eating it does slip and slide a bit but to me that's no big deal so it's each to their own.

I had high hopes. It was a great price, so I thought I'd found the holy grail of cheap and pretty lipsticks. I wasn't a fan of how shimmery it came on, and when applied, the color looked a few shades different from how it looked as a solid, so it wasn't very flattering. It isn't bad, just not my favorite.

The silkiness of this product is what really got me hooked on it. Wet N Wild has been one of my favorite brands since middle school and I still wear their makeup to this day. The application of this lipstick is flawless. I've wore this a lot in selfies and used it for looks I've done for Instagram.

It was a decent product. I would definitely rather splurge on a more expensive lip product but if your in a situation where this lip product is your only option it's totally not a bad choice. This is also a good lipstick to take on vacation with you because if you're anything like me you lose everything so if you lose this you won't be too mad because it was so affordable!

I think this product has a great texture to lips,but i found that once i started using it more often my color changed. It had a more baby pink when i bout it but then i used most of the top of the color was then a dark pink. Also if you roll it up the shade is also dark pink. Will i buy this product again. Probably not, i dont know if anyone else had the problem that i had but i did end up trowing it out because the shade i knew i was never going to use.

Has a lot of pigment to it. Very creamy and easy to apply. It has very nice packaging. Very cute and cute. It is very easy to use, it's very creamy with a good texture. It was very cheap for me. I will continue to buy this product in the future. When I run out!

The Wet N Wild Silk Finish Lipstick is great. It has great quality and is very smooth and soft on the lips. It is one of my favorite lipsticks and the color is phenomenal. I like it just the way it is although I'm wondering how they got all of the pigment. I am very happy with the fact that it is so simple but does such a great job.

Very good for the price and lasts an alright time, nice but you do need to touch up thought out the day and it gets on everything and leaves lip marks on cups, has a nice easy design though so if you can stay away from anything it could get on you'll be good

I only gave this 3 stars because I'm not huge on non-liquid lipstick. Because these are so cheap, I got multiples to start myself on lipstick. After I got the hang of these, I went to the liquid catsuit from wet & wild. I also get these if I need a color but don't wanna spend a lot on it.

Super cheap and affordable. Cute colors with decent pigmentation. Pretty comfy on the lips as well. Lasting power is about the same for any bullet lipstick so will have to reapply throughout the day. Packaging feels cheap and not very sturdy but the product itself is pretty good. I would recommend to anyone wanting a good affordable lipstick in their collection.

For the price I really can't complain but I will say the packaging sucks. The lid always slips off which is dangerous if you're going to carry it around. Good colour pay off but no stay power and it does DRY your lips out so I definitely would not recommend if your lips are already chapped.

I absolutely love these drugstore lipsticks! They're creamy, deposit loads of pigment onto my lips. Amazingly they last a really long time without fading, drying, crumbling, or flaking. My only one concern is the stupid cap. I wish Wet n Wild would fix that feature on their tube lipsticks. They are not secured nor do they stay secured. I'm always afraid to just toss them into my handbag in fear they would uncap itself and smear all over bag and staining it forever.

These lipsticks are very reasonably priced. These are perfect for someone who is just starting out with makeup and wanting to learn how to use lipstick. They come in many cute colors. They go onto the lips super creamy and have good pigmentation. I did find these lipsticks to be very drying if I had them on for a while. They are not long lasting, so you have to keep reapplying them throughout the day. These lipsticks have a strong chemical smell to them. I'm not a fan of these lipsticks but they are cheap and have good pigmentation.

Wet n Wild is one of those Classic Brands that your mom probably used that is still relevant. I still use wet and wild as a going to be out but don't want to waste the expensive stuff you know for like work parties and going to the bar. It's just like one of those staple products that every girl has probably used at least once in their life.

Honestly not really a big fan of this lipstick brand. I was really disappointed with how the product lasted throughout the day and was honestly shocked because I'm a big fan of this company's other products, however it was a pretty color. Sadly would not recommend to friends due to my personal experience with the product.

After getting this product I honestly love it I love the color that pops that makes my eyes come out. The packaging is easy to open the price is perfect it's not too hot and not too low. I would recommend it to anyone. And is my awesome go to lipstick for any occasion and can never go wrong.

I love the packaging. It is easy to use and the cap won't be lost easily as it takes up a lot of space. The finish isn't silky unfortunately because it's more patchy and just sticks onto the surface of the lips and fills in lines making them more apparent. :(

Wet n Wild has really stepped it up! I truly have liked all the shades of lipsticks I've tried. Although the texture and formula of the lipstick is a little dry, I would like it to be more moisturizing. But it lasts a decent amount of time and they're SO affordable.

These are great for starting out, finding colors that suit you. The shade range is decent, but nothing that really wows me. The formula is good for the price. Unlike the dollar elf ones, those were awful. Would totally recommend these for beginners or if your on a tight budget. For the price it beats a lot of other dollar lipsticks.

I will always love this lipstick. It was the first lippie I ever used years ago as a beginner in makeup on a budget. For how affordable these lipsticks are, they're good. Now they aren't going to stay all day, you will have to reapply, they do have that old lady lipstick smell but for the price it's worth it. The pigment is there, they're true to color, it's a good formula, they feel good on the lips, creamy and moisturizing. I still like these and recommend.
